document.full_text: ryan miller stopped 30 shots for his fifth shutout of the season in leading the buffalo sabres to a 2-0 victory over the visiting devils that all but ended the devils' playoff hopes saturday night.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: for devils, no goals and dwindling hopes
lines_and_colors: ryan miller stopped 30 shots for his fifth shutout of the season in leading the buffalo sabres to a 2-0 victory over the visiting devils that all but ended the devils' playoff hopes saturday night.
